Reviews.Title: Great SLR camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Cookie Monster
Reviews.Content: This is intended to be an entry-level SLR and it fully meets my expectations. Great photos even in low light, fast response, lots of options (plenty for beginner-intermediate photographer). The telephoto lens is well worth the investment.A tip: There are lots of lens options for this camera. You can get a cheaper telephoto lens (for example the 75-300 that comes in another bundled combo set) but pay close attention to what you're getting: the 75-300 does NOT have image stabilization. The 55-250 IS lens that comes in this bundle is a better lens - a great match for this camera.

Reviews.Title: 55-250 lens and T3 Bundle
Reviews.Author: Evil Spoon
Reviews.Content: I am not going to add to the conversation on how great this camera and lens both are for their individual prices. Yep! They're great! I just wanted to give people a heads up -- DO THE MATH!! Sometimes it is cheaper to buy the camera and the telephoto lens separately... as much as $120 cheaper if you shop around. Sometimes this bundle will price itself low enough to be worth the money. Sometimes not. So be careful and don't just buy this up. As of the moment I am writing this, you'd save $70 on Amazon buying the two products seperately. That, of course, is subject to change.Happy shopping!

Reviews.Title: BEST CAMERA EVER!!
Reviews.Author: roach1upkennels
Reviews.Content: Bought this for family/dog/motocross photos and couldn't be HAPPIER! Easy to use, the extra lens is a MUST. Super fast speed, and professional quality pics everytime. HIGHLY RECOMMEND this to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Stacey,)
Reviews.Content: I have had my camera for two weeks and it works great. The picture quality is professional grade.  I spend hours outdoors with my camera and my nature pictures are incredible.  Get the Rebel T31100D field guide written by Charlotte K. Lowrie and have fun.  Purchased from Amazon and got package deal with Zoom Lens.  Great value.  Easy to use, lots of creativity options.  If your a beginner this is a good pick to learn and grow with.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Money
Reviews.Author: JeffNJ
Reviews.Content: An entry level SLR, which is what I was looking for.  Lens movement for zoom and focusing are smooth.  Camera construction is great quality.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: JTM
Reviews.Content: Totally satisfied. Simple to use and fabulous quality pictures, and fast action. If you are using a phone for pictures- Stop. Just stop right now. You are missing alot. Takes nice video also.

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel T3 Amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: 2 old 2 die
Reviews.Content: The rebel EOS T3 is fantastic with the 18 - 55mm and 55 - 250mm lenses you can make any shot look professional.  Yes there are better cameras available, but not for the price. The Software that came with the Camera is great and has some great effects. The 32GB card is fantastic and holds lots of shots and the price was great.

Reviews.Title: I love my camera
Reviews.Author: megan
Reviews.Content: I'm a professional photographer and it was time for a new camera and I found this one for a great price and it turned out great takes really clear pics and is so worth every penny I spent on it!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera---great price
Reviews.Author: CJB
Reviews.Content: We ordered this camera before Christmas---I received it on Christmas eve just before our party.  I charged the battery and started shooting away, and the second picture I took with this camera of my 5 yr. old we ended up making into a 5x7.  My wife and I both love the camera---it is easy to use and takes great pictures.  This is our first dslr camera, and what I like most is to be able to look through the viewfinder at our kids and be able to take the shot the instant you see that expression your looking for.  Our point and shoot camera does a good job also, but it misses a lot of shots b/c it is too slow.  I am still learning to use it so I am not going to be able to go into too much depth about it, but I am very happy so far with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: Adriana M. A. Melo
Reviews.Content: The greatest camera I'd have. Love the usability of it. Would buy again and again. Canon is really a good camera

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Matthews
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for 5 months now and I absolutely love it!  The camera takes amazing still shots and is simple to use. We used the video on a recent vacation and it is also amazing.

Reviews.Title: what can I say that was not said before ? - this is a great camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: obensha
Reviews.Content: Its a wonderful camera, I was debating whether to get the Rebel T2i or this one and decided on this because of the weight and the deal it was on. I could not be happier with this camera. I assume if you care about rapid RAW format shooting this is not for you but as someone who tends to shoot JPEG mainly I have this camera to be a perfect fit. the grip is very good and I don't feel a lack of the rubberized grip of the higher 'i' series. taking multiple short concurrently (I normally take 3-4 in succession to choose the best) is easy, responsiveness with and without flash is great, battery life cannot is unequaled by anything I used before. in short - very close to perfect and the price/performance really cannot be beat. Coupled with the Caselogic slingshot bag I got that holds both lenses, the extra battery and extra memory stick + sensor cleaning kit and wallet this makes for an extremely easy to carry around camera kit. I couldn't be happier with my purchase

Reviews.Title: Great deal...
Reviews.Author: Jo Mama
Reviews.Content: This is my first SLR camera so I'm still learning my way around it, but so far it's a piece of cake to use!  Very lightweight and easy to handle.  The stability feature in the lenses is awesome.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Home Run!
Reviews.Author: R. J. Ferrer "papillon"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera primarily to capture photos of my daughter's first baby.  Knowing she did not have anything even close to the level of this item(mostly point-and-shoots) I decided that, after an overnight stay at her house, I would "forget" to take the camera back home.  Well, the rest is history, as they say; daughter's been using the camera almost as much as the changing table for the baby!...and I couldn't be happier. This Canon product is relatively user-friendly and throughout the hundred of shots taken so far since Thanksgiving Day 2012, every picture is a keeper!  Coupled with a Canon 200DG camera bag, the included additional lens, and, last but not least, Amazon's  AWESOME quick and reliable delivery service, this purchase was, for me, a Home Run.

Reviews.Title: I am not a professional photographer
Reviews.Author: Janete King "Flor"
Reviews.Content: but I love this camera. It's such an upgrade from the regular cameras I have. My husband gave me this EOS Rebel as a gift and I am so overwhelmed with joy and curiosity to learn all the functions. The manual is so long and there are so many possibilities that I'm not sure if I will be ever able to use all. I'm thinking about taking some classes and learn more about my camera, so I can take full advantage of it. At first, I had issues playing the videos on my computer. They were all blurry and had these red horizontal lines. I read the manual, and it seemed that I was doing everything right, but for some reason I couldn't fix the issue. I thought about returning the camera because I was certain that it was damaged. Then, I contacted Canon and they sent me an email asking some specific questions. The issue was that I had not installed the canon software on my computer (genius jumped this step) and I was copying/pasting the videos and trying to play them on Windows Media Player. Canon customer service representative "hold my hand" and went with me step-by-step over all the things I need to do. It does work perfectly now. So, sometimes if the manual is not clear enough, I just contact Canon.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: none
Reviews.Content: Have had this camera for almost a year, I can say that it takes great pictures, light, good fit for large hands, outstanding battery life, well worth the money spent, you will not be disapointed with purchasing, great fun to use and has had not a single issue in it's operation, what else could you ask for!

Reviews.Title: Truly a great investment.
Reviews.Author: S. Lee
Reviews.Content: With a lively toddler about, all my point and shoot photos were nothing but blurrs.  I did not want his toddlerhood memories to also be a blur.  I wanted those artful photos I see in all the lovely mom blogs I read.  After buying this camera I am well on my way to taking great pictures.  This is a great camera and I have caught those special moments and expressions quickly and easily.  I haven't yet figured out how to work this camera to its fullest extend, but I look forward to it in the years to come.  Just in Auto mode its spectacular.  Its worth the money and the package I received from Amazon was a better deal than in the stores.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted!
Reviews.Author: RH45011
Reviews.Content: I came from a canon s95 model. Loved the camera except for the fact I wanted to control my depth of field and I couldn't get that effect with it. I ended up losing the camera after 11 months, so I decided to upgrade. This camera is awesome! It takes wonderful shots and is so incredibly easy to use if you are used to a point and shoot camera. I would definitely recommend this camera for those beginners!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: PaveHawg
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera and an additional telephoto lens.  They came in perfect condition, all worked as advertised and I am very pleased with it.  I will purchase from this dealer again.

Reviews.Title: User friendly
Reviews.Author: Dejuan J. Carter
Reviews.Content: I've only used the camera a few times since getting it weeks ago, but the quality of photos and video surpassed my expectations.  I've taken many shots in various modes (auto, sports, portrait, and landscape).  The camera seems to set itself to the best settings based on the lighting and type of shot I've described I'll take.  It's very user friendly and doesn't take a rocket scientist to figure out.  I just want to take really nice pictures without having the fully understand f-stops, shutter speeds, iso settings, etc...  The videos also are very clear with a great microphone which surprised me.  I'll actually shoot more videos than expected.  The only thing I don't like is having to swith between the 18-55mm to the 55-250mm.  This gets a little cumbersome at times, but getting an 18-200mm will likly handle most environments.  I'll probably get one of those lenses later, but for now I'm completely satisfied.  Very good camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Nothing but positive
Reviews.Author: JohnLJ
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a gift for my girlfriend and she was more than thrilled having always wanted a DSLR. The extra lense is a great second option to the included smaller one. Because we are both beginners though, we have quite a bit of learning to do before we can fully appreciate the product. So far, it's a beautiful camera that takes beautiful standard photos.

Reviews.Title: Great Choice
Reviews.Author: Tky Hunter
Reviews.Content: This digital SLR will do more than 90% of its users are capable of doing with a camera. Having used Nikon 35mm SLRs for many years and processing my own film, this Canon digital has been fine for everything I want to do with it. It is also great for my wife who is strictly a point and shooter.For anyone who is not the upper 7% of the photography crowd, this is a smart and nearly fool-proof system. For most, your pictures will look like they were taken by someone who knew what they were doing. Pick up an extra tele-photo lens and go out and have fun.Good choice

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: L. B. Soto
Reviews.Content: The camera has many features and takes excellent photographs.The battery can take about 800 pictures before you download. I recomend it.

Reviews.Title: Lives up to expectations
Reviews.Author: Sunil Lalla
Reviews.Content: A great camera for a beginner!! The extra zoom totally worth it! Pictures very clear and wonderful for family photos

Reviews.Title: Great SLR
Reviews.Author: Canon54
Reviews.Content: Got this to use along side of my old Rebel XT, which is still working like new, and is 6 yrs. old. The fact It has 2 IS lenses is a real plus to me. Camera works great. Good speed, crisp details in pictures. I don't use the Auto settings. I shoot in Aperture or shutter priority, and always use my Canon 430EX-ll flash. Agree it's not a big pro series, but I'm just out to get some good pictures, and this fits my needs.

Reviews.Title: Camerea
Reviews.Author: Hemayat Obaidi
Reviews.Content: the camera I got is EOS Rebel T# with  15-55mm extra lens to take photographs in deferent condition of day and nights. this Camera has good resolution and durable in deferent environment to get interesting pictures from parties, nature, animals in interesting ways.

Reviews.Title: great photos
Reviews.Author: Victoria Hoopes
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures, and I am so glad I bought it. I used to do photography, but have forgotten much of it. This is a great camera to jump back in with.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL
Reviews.Author: Lowelll Hightower
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect camera for what I need.  It takes great pictures of the Grandkids.  That's what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: good until now
Reviews.Author: yanfei ma
Reviews.Content: I haven't used my camera so much, so I don't know if it is perfect or not. I just took few photos, and that's good.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Camera
Reviews.Author: Limberth
Reviews.Content: Very good camera, awesome pictures my sister love the Camera and take it with her all the time.Good price and outstanding quality. seller and amazon delivered the product on time.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS II Lens + Canon EF-S 55-250mm
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Suter "FTIENG1"
Reviews.Content: I bought this with the intent of using it on my cruise to Alaska.  I am definitely not very good with camera's so this was a big leap of faith for me.  Relied on a lot of reviews (thank you), and bought this over others.  The lens was great though heavy.  I ended up keeping the 55 mm on most of the time because of this.  I did like the fact the telephoto lens was automatic.  I am not good at camera's remember.  One word of caution when you get a camera like this be aware you take a LOT of pictures.  I had over a thousand on a one week cruise.  I found myself doing multiple shots and boring all my friends when I later displayed them.  How many eagles can you see in fifty shots (one).A good camera for the entry level bug like me.  Just don't leave it on the shelf or in the bag.

Reviews.Title: Happily taking photos again
Reviews.Author: L. Brooks
Reviews.Content: Bought this after trading in my first "beginner" DSLR which was a Nikon. I'm very glad I did the trade. This camera is lighter and fits into my hands perfectly. There is a live view, which the Nikon lacked, although I tend to use the viewfinder out of old school habit. I have yet to read the entire manual, but the camera is easy to operate on automatic settings.I use the camera for close up food photography and also with the telephoto lens for parades and other outdoor events. I have also been able to take decent quality photos using this camera while on a road trip - I thought they'd be blurry due to vehicle vibration and the scenery zipping by at 60mph, but the pics were surprisingly clear.Had some issues loading the software onto Windows 8, but I did get there eventually.

Reviews.Title: Great first DSLR!
Reviews.Author: Merideth
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the amateur photographer. This thing does everything I needed and more. Just be prepared to do lots of reading and research on how to really use the camera. Only thing is once you get comfortable with what this thing does you will want to upgrade and purchase more lenses. Once you start it is hard to stop the shutterbug.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera just before a road trip through the Grand Canyon, Zion and Sequoia.  I got shots with the 250mm zoom lens that I would never had gotten without it.  Very easy to use and picture quality is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Camera Canon EOS Rebel 3, GREAT
Reviews.Author: Suzann Wallace
Reviews.Content: meets ALL my expections.  Instruction book easy to read and understand.Camera is easy to handle.  I had an Olymus before but the Canon is easier to read.

Reviews.Title: Super Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Hightower "Amazon's Secret Shopper"
Reviews.Content: This is my first SLR camera and I love it.  It does exactly what I wanted it to do.  WONDERFUL BUY!!!!

Reviews.Title: A good debutant model
Reviews.Author: supersailorke
Reviews.Content: This is a good model for someone that starts out working with a SLR camera. The fact that you can also film in HD is really nice. I bought it for a trip to Antarctica and there is just nothing better than an SLR when going to those places. (People using Ipads to take pictures there should be left behind there).The grip is ok, but could be a little larger (especially wider) for my hands to be completely comfortable.

Reviews.Title: Great entry level DSLR - Excellent product price
Reviews.Author: LinuxGuy
Reviews.Content: I have been a Canon camera user since 1976 with a AE-1.  With the digital age, I have been using decent quality point-and-shoot cameras but I have always wanted to go back to the feel and the quality of a "good" camera where I could have more control of the picture taking process.  The Canon Rebel T3 came in this week and has exceeded my expectations.  The camera is very fast and the picture quality is so far above what I have achieved with the point-and shoot cameras I have been using.  There are so many features for picture taking it will take me a while to learn what they all do and the appropriate time to use each.  I also added a very fast SDHC card and it blazing fast.I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome pictures
Reviews.Author: Susan Giafaglione
Reviews.Content: We first bought a $100 digital camera, it was good, but wanted something a little more.  When comparing these pictures to the other, our daughter just pops right out of the picture.  We can not believe what great pictures they are.  I can use the camera as a point and shoot and my husband can use all of the controls and make the picture what he would like it to look like.  We love it!

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed for business & fun!
Reviews.Author: Carla Danielson
Reviews.Content: We live on a ranch, breed and sell horses and train horses for a living. I have always taken lots of photos for our website, etc. and have been told I have a good eye, but have never owned more than just a pocket camera.This camera is perfect for me! I don't want to get too technical and the auto focus is just outstanding! The zoom is strong and lets me capture those precious mare-foal moments from far enough away that I don't interfere with  the action.Great camera & good service.

Reviews.Title: New Camera
Reviews.Author: Frank A
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best buys I have ever made. I spent a lot of time looking at what was available, and I kept coming back to the Canon.  You can't go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: Great for beginners!
Reviews.Author: Dzmitry
Reviews.Content: T3 is absolutely great for beginners! User friendly, easy-to-operate camera will help you to make first steps to photo, learning about aperture, shutter speed etc. 55-250mm - is a must, kit is not enough.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: Took it on a recent Disney vacation. Had a great time learning how to use it. The pictures were great.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Joseph W. Siefers
Reviews.Content: Owned this camera since just after it came on the market....nothing but high marks so far...purchased as a backup? alongside? my 40D..Haven't used the 40D since.  I am sure I had good reasons for shelling out those extra bucks on a 40D but I can't remember what they were.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: This camera is very good for its price. I highly recommend it to people who don't know too much about cameras. It's easy to use and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel From SpeedyTechShop
Reviews.Author: gordy_davis
Reviews.Content: I ordered this on Saturday morning. By noon it shipped with an eta between today and Friday 7/27.I got home from work this evening and my wife was already learning to use it. We are going to be looking for accessories for it and hope to find it from these guys.Thank you!

Reviews.Title: good camera, good price
Reviews.Author: James A. Brennan Jr.
Reviews.Content: Pictures are crisp and clear.  Bought it with the 55-250mm zoom which takes some great pictures.  I'm wondering how much better the quality is on at t2i or t3i.  My theory is you're better off buying a bit behind the curve and still getting great Canon pictures at a great price.  I see where the t4 is out now which seems to have improved video focusing but I'd rather buy this camera for great still shots and a Vixia for movies.  Price for the T3 plus 55-250 lens plus Vixia is about the same as the T4. Battery life is great.  Never seems to run down.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, especially for a beginner
Reviews.Author: D. Perry
Reviews.Content: I really like how simple this camera is to use, and this model was a real good value because some newer versions have come out.  I'm not sure what the newer versions do better but this camera is such a vast improvement over point and click cameras that I previously used.  I've got a 6 year old and an 8 year old and I can now get pictures that aren't blurry or a split second too late.  I can take 3-4 shots within 5 seconds so that I don't have to try and be perfect with my timing.  The zoom lense has been really great for sports shots or shots from over 20 feet away.  It's easy to switch out.  I'm told it takes very good video as well although I haven't tried it out yet.  Battery life has been great.  I got a basic 8 GB card and it has been fine.  Amazon had the best price and clearly spelled out that the zoom lens was the Canon brand lens (other discount sites were vague).

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Entry Level SLR
Reviews.Author: Mark S.
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera for my Wife's Christmas gift. We were looking to get out of point and shoot  cameras and move into something with more features and better photos.This camera fits the bill for both. This camera is easy to use and to takes outstanding photos. Although we are still figuring out all the features, we have been impressed with its ease of use and the many features available to us.We are going to take a camera class to learn more about this camera and will update our review once we have used the camera longer.December 2012 - Now that we have owned the camera for nearly a year, we can still give this item great marks. It is a very easy to use camera and it takes outstanding pictures. Another nice feature is the number of photos you can take without having to download to a computer.  Would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Davecooker
Reviews.Content: Needed a digital SLR, but did not want anything complicated. This fills the bill. Have used it in fully auto mode with excellent results.All functions are easily understood and implemented.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: Teresa Casey
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for myself. I really enjoy the camera and the zoom lens for family and outdoor pictures

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera - We have gotten SO many comments about the clarity of our photos
Reviews.Author: AngryPapa
Reviews.Content: Also got the 250mm lens with image stabilization and we actually take the majority of our pics with it.  Takes a bit more work, but the results are astonishing (SO much better than our little 12megapixel canon point and click).  A bunch of family and friends have asked what camera we have after they have seen the pics.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift!
Reviews.Author: White Oak Worker
Reviews.Content: Was able to take great pictures right out of the box once the battery was charged. The automatic settings were adequate to get started with and the many features and advanced operation appear easy and intuitive to use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a starter DSLR
Reviews.Author: gators
Reviews.Content: I'm by no means a camera expert, but I enjoy playing with a few settings. This camera takes great pictures for me and gives me more than enough control. The response time for taking a picture is very fast and I feel the pictures come out very good.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Lucas
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift for my dad, now he's the happiest photographer with his new camera!!This device is really easy to use and the quality of the pictures are awesome.

Reviews.Title: Like it very much!!!
Reviews.Author: Robert Dumlao
Reviews.Content: I'm a semi-amateur photg...so, when I finally found it affordbale,bought it & happy with it. Can't wait to buy a more advanced Canon.

Reviews.Title: fantastic...my introduction to REAL photography
Reviews.Author: jsdskier
Reviews.Content: fantastic camera, lighweight, clear, sharp images, good price. One of the best purchases I've done lately. this camera is my introduction to real photography.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful so far
Reviews.Author: V. Watson "tv watcher"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for a gift.  My husband is still learning all the bells and whistles.  But so far, he loves it.  I am impressed with the super quality of the pictures he's taken so far.  He says it is the best toy he's gotten in several years.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 2 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens +
<2> Canon EF-S 55-250mm IS Lens
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS II Lens + Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS Telephoto Zoom Lens
